actions.committee: Senate Committee on Post Office and Civil Service
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.

committees.committee: Senate Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: A bill to revise the payment of compensation to widows and widowers of certain deceased Federal employees.

summary.text: Provides that in the case of a surviving spouse of a Federal employee whose compensation is terminated because of remarriage, compensation at the same rate shall be restored commencing on the day the remarriage is dissolved by death, annulment, or divorce, if any lump sum paid on termination of the compensation is repaid.

titles.title: A bill to revise the payment of compensation to widows and widowers of certain deceased Federal employees.
